item.title: ::Switch to ancients
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

put it in code or it looks messy

if (command.startsWith("switch")) { NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; animation(435, absY, absX); RemoveAllWindows(); if (ancients == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); // /normal = 1151 ancients = 0; sendMessage("You convert to normal magic!"); } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("You convert to ancient magicks!"); } }

Read full topic

item.title: ::Switch to ancients
item.dc:creator: @CripScape_Jeff CripScape Jeff
item.description:
@CripScape_Jeff wrote:

	if (command.startsWith("switch")) {
		NpcDialogue = 0;
		NpcDialogueSend = false;
		animation(435, absY, absX);
		RemoveAllWindows();
		if (ancients == 1) {
			setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); // magic tab (ancient = 12855);
			// /normal = 1151
			ancients = 0;
			sendMessage("You convert to normal magic!");
		} else {
			setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // magic tab (ancient = 12855);
			ancients = 1;
			sendMessage("You convert to ancient magicks!");
		}
	}

Read full topic
